disk

Class Directory

  • java.lang.Object
    • disk.Directory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Directory
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class that represents a directory inside a disk.
    Author:
    Jose Antonio Rodriguez Rivera
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
